synopsis.p: Reads terms in OBO files as documents.

description.p: reads files specified by in OBO format. Each term is loaded as a distinct document with the term identifier as the document identifier. Each document contains a section () containing the term name, and one section for each term synonym (). Optionally also sets features on the document with the term path from the root (), the identifier of the parent term (), the identifiers of each ancestor (), of the identifiers of each child term ().

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as context element. If the result is false, then the module does not process the module.

param-doc.name: constantDocumentFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each document created by this module

param-doc.name: excludeOBOBuiltins
param-doc.p: Either to exclude builtin OBO terms.

param-doc.name: nameSectionName
param-doc.p: Name of the section that contains the term name.

param-doc.name: synonymSectionName
param-doc.p: Name of the sections that contains the term synonyms.

param-doc.name: constantSectionFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each section created by this module

param-doc.name: parentFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature that contains the term parents.

param-doc.name: pathFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature that contains the term paths.

param-doc.name: ancestorsFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature that contains the term ancestors ids.

param-doc.name: childrenFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature that contains the term children ids.

param-doc.name: idPrefix
param-doc.p: Prefix to prepend to each Term identifier.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
